ReviewList.Text: Physics is hard no matter what textbook you use, but this textbook is not cohesive. The examples are not helpful and do not help to solidify the concepts taught in each chapter. I would recommend that students who are required to purchase this textbook to also purchase a supplementary text because, from experience, I know that this text was not enough to teach me physics in an easy and efficient manner.
I was totally excited when it arrived since it was my favorite class and it made me remember my college days. Totally excited to read and try the problems again.
Great book to help me study Physics and learn all I need to help my daughter pass her physics exams.
Exactly the same book they have at your campus bookstore only for much less.

This books seems easy and simple enough to understand, but I think it lacks depth.  Which, is probably what makes it so simple.  I feel there are some things that it could explain a little better though, in reading.  Especially for a user who has no physics and a weak math background (which is pretty much why we're taking this course, yes?).
I waited until the last minute to buy this book, and I chose the right person to buy it from. They sent it to me just in time. Thank you! I would definitely buy from this seller again!
Great seller, great product!! Totally recommended!! The description of the product was very clear, and i got it before the time.! Very happy with the purchase!!!!!!
Very quick shipment and the item was in excellent condition - very happy with the transaction
